item.title: A Complete Unknown Is The Perfect Double Feature With This Coen Brothers Movie With 92% On RT
item.description: A Complete Unknown's encapsulation of the '60s New York folk scene makes it the perfect double feature with the Coen brothers' own musical drama.

item.title: 6 Taylor Sheridan Movies Every Yellowstone Fan Should Watch
item.description: Taylor Sheridan is well-known for creating the hit neo-Western series, Yellowstone, and luckily, some of his movies hit the same exact spot.
